hero.description: Transform your body, elevate your mind, and unleash your potential with our cutting-edge fitness programs designed for champions.

about.title: Why
about.description: We are more than just a gym - we are a place where transformations become reality. Our mission is to help you discover the best version of yourself.

equipment.title: Modern Equipment
equipment.description: The latest fitness equipment from renowned manufacturers

trainers.title: Professional Trainers
trainers.description: Experienced personal trainers ready to help you achieve your goals

atmosphere.title: Friendly Atmosphere
atmosphere.description: A supportive fitness community for all levels

results.title: Proven Results
results.description: Hundreds of satisfied members who have reached their fitness goals

story.title: Our Story
story.p1: FitZone was born out of a passion for fitness and the desire to create a place where everyone can feel comfortable during training. Since 2018, we have been helping people achieve their fitness goals in a friendly and motivating environment.
story.p2: Our values are professionalism, support, and continuous growth. We believe that fitness is not just about exercise, but a lifestyle that brings joy and satisfaction.

pricing.title: Choose your
pricing.description: Flexible plans tailored to your needs and budget. No hidden fees, no long-term commitments.
pricing.footerNote: All plans include a free 7-day trial

features: Unlimited access to all gym equipment

trainers.title: Our
trainers.description: Meet our team of certified professionals dedicated to helping you achieve your fitness goals.

anna.description: Crossfit champion with 8 years of experience. She specializes in high-intensity training and will help you push past your limits.

pawel.description: Expert in building muscle mass and strength. He has helped hundreds of clients achieve their physique goals.

maria.description: Certified yoga and pilates instructor. She combines traditional techniques with modern methods for full body and mind harmony.

tomasz.description: Specialist in cardio and fat-burning workouts. He motivates you to push your limits and achieve the best results.

kasia.description: Physiotherapist and stretching coach. She helps with recovery, injury prevention, and improving body flexibility.

ola.description: Energetic dance and zumba instructor. She makes every workout pure joy and positive energy.

marcin.description: Former MMA fighter. He leads boxing and martial arts training for all levels, focusing on technique and safety.

certification.description: All our trainers are certified professionals with extensive experience in their respective fields.

headTrainer.consultation: Available for consultations and personal training

testimonials.title: What our
testimonials.description: Real stories of transformation and success from our members. Join the community of happy FitZone clients!
reviews: FitZone completely changed my approach to fitness. The trainers are amazing, and the atmosphere motivates you to take action every day!
The best gym in town! Modern equipment, professional staff, and great group classes. I recommend it to everyone!
Thanks to FitZone, I lost 15 kg and feel fantastic. The nutrition plan and trainer support are key to success!
Personal training at FitZone helped me achieve the goals I dreamed of. Professionalism at the highest level!
Yoga and Pilates classes at FitZone are pure relaxation. The instructors are patient and helpful. I feel at home here!
Crossfit at FitZone is a real challenge! The group is super supportive, and the results exceeded my wildest expectations.

contact.title: Get in
contact.description: Have questions or want to join? Contact us today and take the first step towards a healthier, fitter you!

footer.description: Modern gym and fitness club where everyone can find something for themselves. Join us and start your transformation today!
